title: Encode N-ary Tree to Binary Tree
metaData:

  "params": [

      "name": "root",
      "type": "TreeNode"
    }
  ],

  "manual": true, "typescriptCustomType" : "class _Node {\n    val: number\n    children: _Node[]\n    \n    constructor(v: number) {\n        this.val = v;\n        this.children = [];\n    }\n}\n"
